summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of Lots 1, 2, 3, 30, 31 and 32, Blocks 1 to 5 inclusive, H. E. Nelson's Addition, with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-210 and 17-156, respectively.
